title: Energy grid investment to push up household bills
description: Ofgem says the investment will help lower reliance on imported gas and make wholesale energy cheaper.
content:
Household energy bills will rise to help fund a £28bn investment in the UK's energy network.
Most of the funding in energy regulator Ofgem's five-year plan will go towards maintaining gas networks, … [+1933 chars]
